name: Perfect Bound Books
shortDescription: Professional softcover books with a square spine. Ideal for novels, manga, and anthologies.
description: Our perfect bound books offer a sleek, professional finish that artists and authors love. Using a strong, flexible glue, we bind the pages to a wrap-around cover, creating a durable square spine that looks great on any bookshelf. Perfect for projects with 28 to 400+ pages.

name: Saddle Stitch Booklets
shortDescription: Cost-effective stapled booklets. Great for comics, zines, and catalogs.
description: Saddle stitching is the go-to binding method for comics, zines, and shorter booklets. Sheets are folded and stapled through the fold line, allowing the book to lay fully flat. Itâ€™s economical, fast, and perfect for lower page counts.

name: Premium Art Prints
shortDescription: High-fidelity prints on cardstock. The staple of every Artist Alley table.
description: Capture every detail of your artwork with our premium cardstock prints. We use high-grade coated stocks that make colors pop and blacks deep. Available in standard framing sizes and custom cuts.

name: Manga Printing
shortDescription: Authentic manga printing with right-to-left binding options and creamy paper.
description: We specialize in printing manga the way it was meant to be read. Choose from standard trade sizes, authentic cream-colored uncoated paper stocks, and even right-to-left binding configuration to give your doujinshi or original manga that professional feel.
